channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- JBoss BRMS

item.title: CVE-2012-5626|2024-08-06T21:14:16.255Z -- red%20hat -- jboss%20brms
item.description: EJB method in Red Hat JBoss BRMS 5; Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5; Red Hat JBoss Operations Network 3.1; Red Hat JBoss Portal 4 and 5; Red Hat JBoss SOA Platform 4.2, 4.3, and 5; in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Web Server 1 ignores roles specified using the @RunAs annotation.
